channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s special envoy involved in talks to end Russia’s war on Ukraine says ‘I don’t regard Putin as a bad guy’
item.description: Steve Witkoff praised Putin in glowing terms as trustworthy and said the Russian leader told him he had prayed for his "friend" Trump when he was shot...

item.title: Tesla isn’t the worst S&P stock this year. This maker of Ugg and Hoka shoes is.
Think twice before filing for an income-tax deadline extension this year
Musk and his ‘DOGE’ are putting Social Security on a privatization path: critics
Have you missed out on gold’s record run? Take a look at silver.
Pentagon launches probe including polygraphs after Musk visit
item.description: Musk insisted on the prosecution of Pentagon officials leaking misleading information to the media.

item.title: Trump plans his tariff ‘Liberation Day’ with more targeted push
item.description: It’s shaping up as more focused than the sprawling, fully global effort Trump has otherwise mused about, officials familiar with the matter say.

item.title: The F-47 stealth fighter will likely be the ‘most important defense decision’ of Trump’s entire term, retired Air Force general says
item.description: Trump said at the White House on Friday that Boeing beat out Lockheed Martin on an award that could eventually yield hundreds of billions of dollars.

item.title: Tesla investors at a loss as Elon Musk drags down stock price: ‘This time it feels different’
item.description: Tesla finds itself in uncharted territory, now that it appears to have lost its aura of infallibility, leaving punters in the dark about its outlook.

item.title: The stock market has never before been this politicized. It’s not just Tesla.
